title: Cardano Catalyst TV
description: Voters do not have time to read all the proposals worth voting for and proposers do not have much credibility and reputable to reach voters.
solution: A 3-minute conversation with Cardano Catalyst TV is the fastest means to approach viewers to give general insights and increase reputation.
experience: I am a moderator and interpreter of Vietnam Townhall of Eastern TownHall. I am passionate about Cardano and what it can bring.
